All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActiveEffect
Represents an active effect of a district
Architect
Represents the architect character
Assassin
Represents the assassin character
Bank
The bank ensure that there is only 30 coins in the game.
Bishop
Represents the bishop character
BuilderBot
BuilderBot is a SmartBot that prioritizes building a citadel.
Card
Represents a card (for a district)
CardChoosingStrategy
Represents a strategy to choose a card to add to the citadel
Character
Represents a character in the game
ChoosingCharacterToTargetFirstPlayer
Represents a strategy to choose a character by taking the one that will be the most useful to slow down the player who is the closest to win
Cli
The Cli class is the view of the game.
CommonCharacter
Represents a common character in the game
CustomBot
The CustomBot class represents a bot on a random base that can be customized with different strategies
CustomBotBuilder
The CustomBotBuilder class is a builder for the CustomBot class
CustomFormatter
The CustomFormatter class is a custom formatter for the logger
CustomLogger
The CustomLogger class is a custom logger for the game
CustomStatisticsLogger
The CustomStatisticsLogger class is a custom logger for the statistics
Deck
The Deck class represents the deck of cards
District
The District class represents a district card
DistrictType
The DistrictType enum represents the type of a district
Game
The Game class represents a game of Citadels
GameBuilder
Builder for the game
GameFactory
Factory for the game exposing static methods to preset create games
GameStatisticsAnalyzer
The GameStatisticsAnalyzer class is responsible for analyzing game statistics and logging aggregated statistics.
GameStatisticsAnalyzer.CsvCategory
The category of the CSV file to save the statistics to.
ICardChoosingStrategy
Represent a strategy to choose a card to add to the citadel
ICharacterChoosingStrategy
Represents a strategy to choose a character
IPickingStrategy
Interface for picking strategies
IUsingMurdererEffectStrategy
Represent a strategy to use effect of the murderer
IUsingThiefEffectStrategy
Represent a strategy to use the effect of the thief
IUsingWarlordEffectStrategy
Represent a strategy to use the effect of the warlord
IView
The view interface
King
The king character
LaboratoryEffect
Effect of laboratory district
Launcher
The main class of the application
Magician
The magician character
MagicianTarget
Represent the target of the magician
ManufactureEffect
The effect of manufacture district
Merchant
The merchant character
Opponent
Represent an opponent
OpportunistBot
The OpportunistBot class represents a bot that makes decisions to maximize its own gain.
PickingAlwaysDistrict
Implementation of the picking strategy where the player always pick district
PickingAlwaysGold
Implementation of the picking strategy where the player always pick gold
Player
Represents a player in the game
PlayerStatistics
The player statistics
RandomBot
The RandomBot class represents a bot that makes random decisions.
RichardBot
The RichardBot class represents a bot that makes decisions to adapt to strategy of community
Role
The role of a character
SmartBot
Represents a smart bot which will try to build the cheaper district in its hand in order to finish its citadel as fast as possible
StrategyUtils
The strategy utils
Thief
The thief character
UsingMurdererEffectToFocusRusher
Represents the strategy of the bot to use the murderer effect to focus the rusher by trying to kill the Merchant or the Architect because they are the most important for the first player so we suppose that the first player certainly has one of them
UsingThiefEffectToFocusRusher
Represents the strategy of the bot to use the thief effect to focus the rusher by trying to kill the Architect or the Merchant because they are the most important for the first player so we suppose that the first player certainly has one of them
UsingWarlordEffectToTargetFirstPlayer
This strategy targets the first player in the game and try to destroy his cheapest district
Warlord
The warlord character
WarlordTarget
The warlord target
